item.title: Large Pothole in Morrisons car park, 12th December
item.description:
There are two large Potholes in Morrison's car park one at the front car park and the second one on the road leading to the back car park. These I understand have already been reported to you by Morrison's Supermarket as well as members of the public. These need to be repaired ASAP before an accident happens
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springfield Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Still pitch black in Peckham Rye Station Arcade, 12th December
item.description:
This is a complete joke now. And you expect people to not feel like they may be murdered when visiting Peckham?? Turn on the lights before something serious actually happens here. Absolutely shocking dereliction of duty by the council. If you claim this isn't your building, stop trying to take the credit for the building refurbishment works and tell the owner to turn on the lights now!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 78, Rye Lane, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Milman rd between Harvist and Kempe Rd, 12th December
item.description:
Thanks for sending someone to sweep the footpaths. Unfortunately they just swept all the leaves onto the road instead of picking them up, so as soon as it’s windy, it will end up back on the footpath.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Milman Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thames Water materials abandoned for 4 years, 12th December
item.description:
There is a section of Wickham Road that has had Thames Water barriers around it since 2021. No work happens here and this site has clearly been abandoned. Can the road be cleared so it can actually be used as intended?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Wickham Road, New Cross, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3x incidents of similar dog waste where kids play, 12th December
item.description:
3 dog stools in 3 days. Council “no dog fouling” signs have been deliberately removed from the area. Toddlers play in this area - it’s a serious risk to health Please post new signage on all lampposts on culford mews to warn negligent owners of the fines.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Culford Mews, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two mattresses and sofa dumped here today, 12th December
item.description:
Two mattreses and a soda dumped this afternoon between 3 and 5pm. Also black bags of waste and overflowing recycling bin which has not been emptied this week. Finally, there is refuse under the large communal bin which needs clearing and builders debris on the street which needs street cleaning.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Church Road, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
